attributes.action: Repeal the Act of Union and allow the home nations to seperate fully.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is obvious that Scotland and Wales are ony interested in the Union due to financial reasons. If the English spoke of others the way the Scots and Welsh speak about the English, it would be considered racist.

England and its people should not be obliged to financialy support peoples of other nations.

The Union is outdated and no longer desired. It is time for the UK to disband, and for England to prosper once again.
